chinese: m恶习；缺点：邪恶；罪行；生理缺陷ad），副的；代理的
睡懒觉是一种恶习。
区 依赖，依靠；信赖
我经常依赖于现成的食物，因为我不擅长做饭！
english: I often rely on ready-made food, because I am so bad at cooking!

chinese: n.（烹调的）原料；（构成的）要素
面粉是面包的主要原料。
english: Flour is the main ingredient of bread

chinese: adj好战的，好暴力的m.激进分子，
这两只好斗的小狗喜欢打架。
english: The two militant puppies love to fight

chinese: n 悬浮；暂停
“吊桥”之所以得名，是因为桥上的道路由钢索
english: A suspension bridge is so named because the road is supported by cables

chinese: n.演讲；报告；介绍；颁奖仪式
这个学生正在做一个关于如何擀面的报告。论如何科学地擀面
english: The student is giving a presentation about how to roll the dough scientifically

chinese: U.指出；代表（或表示）
红色一般用于指出错误。
english: The red color is usually used to denote error

chinese: n，冷淡，不关心
他翻了翻白眼来显示他的冷淡。
english: He rolled his eyes to show his indifference

chinese: 2低声抱怨；低声说，低语 几低语；喃喃说话声
他在睡梦中喃喃自语。
english: He murmured something in his sleep

chinese: adj.奥林匹克运动会的
2016年举行了里约夏季奥运会。
english: The Rio Summer Olympic Games were held in 2016

chinese: 1. 极大的痛苦
当听到这个坏消息时，这个人陷入了极大的痛
english: The man is in agony when hearing the bad news

chinese: n.必需品
在这种气候下，空调是绝对的必需品。
english: Air conditioner is an absolute necessity in this climate

chinese: V 阿谀，使高兴；（肖像等）胜过（真人真物）
“谢谢你的赞美之词。我感到很荣幸。”
english: Thank you for your kind words, I'm flattered

chinese: 1.官邸，巨宅，大厦
你看这座宅邸多宏伟！
english: Look at how huge that mansion is

chinese: cd）疏忽的，粗心大意的
還个工人很粗心，在周围都是油桶的情况下抽
english: The worker was negligent in smoking cigarette with barrels of oil around him

chinese: n. 坚持不懈
在学习英语的过程中，坚持不懈是一项很重要的特质。
english: Perseverance is an important trait to have when learning English
